properties.description: This is a clone of SSE-10, which will be used for Demo purposes
To widen the window for the snapshot.

properties.script:
import sys, json
dashboardList = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
customerName = sys.argv[2]
target_dashboard = None
for dashboard in dashboardList:
  if dashboard['title'].startswith(customerName):
    target_dashboard = dashboard
    break
target_dashboard = f"https://app.thousandeyes.com/dashboard/?dashboardId={target_dashboard['dashboardId']}" if target_dashboard else None

import sys, json
# Hack because SXO converts lists of one element into non-list
agents = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
if not isinstance(agents, list):
  agents = [agents]
agents = [i['agentName'] for i in agents]
affectedAgentNames = '\\n- '.join(agents)

properties.name: severity
properties.description: Local variable used to store Severity

properties.name: alertPermalink
properties.description: clicable link to alert details

properties.name: event_origin_id
properties.description: Event ID from the origin system

properties.name: Response
properties.description: Response Payload from Service Now

properties.name: event_message_short
properties.description:
A short version of the event description in Service Now

Maximum: 160 characters

properties.name: thousand_eyes_event_type
properties.description: The event type received from *thousand eyes*.

properties.name: account
properties.description: The account ID for the account in Service Now

properties.name: event_message
properties.description:
The description to be put on the Service Now event.

Maximum: 4000 characters

properties.name: event_metric_name
properties.description:
Name of the metric that triggered the alert.

Maximum: 256 Characters

Determine whether the event type should be set to "Stateless" or "Stateful". This is based on the event type parameter passed in.

If the event type is one of these:
ALERT_NOTIFICATION_TRIGGER
AGENT_ALERT_NOTIFICATION_TRIGGER

Then we set the event type to stateful. Otherwise we set to stateless

Source: https://confluence-eng-rtp1.cisco.com/conf/display/CXSSEAID/Rebecca%3A+ThousandEyes+Critical+WebSite+Health

Marked as alpha because requirements are not fully completed.

Determine whether the severity is set to "Major" or "Clear". Set to clear if event type is one of:
ALERT_NOTIFICATION_CLEAR
AGENT_ALERT_NOTIFICATION_CLEAR

Otherwise set severity to major

Source: https://confluence-eng-rtp1.cisco.com/conf/display/CXSSEAID/Rebecca%3A+ThousandEyes+Critical+WebSite+Health
Serivce now stupidly returns a 200 for failures
properties.script:
import sys,json
response = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
fail = response.get("result") and len(response['result']) and \
  isinstance(response['result'], list) and \
  response['result'][0] and 'error_message' in response['result'][0]

properties.name: ci_node
properties.description:
Identifier of the host that the event triggered for. Example IP, Host name, Mac address, serial number or sys_id(cmdb_ci) value

Maximum: 256 Characters

properties.name: event_source
properties.description: The name of the event source. Example Splunk (Splunk, Meraki, EM7, DNAC)

properties.name: event_message
properties.description:
User friendly message that can be viewed from ticket description

Maximum: 4000 Characters

properties.name: event_additional_info
properties.description:
Pass as much information in to this field.

Maximum: 10,000 Characters

properties.name: event_message_short
properties.description:
This value goes to Incident 'Short Description'

Maximum: 256 Characters

properties.name: incident_ticket
properties.description: External system can send incident ticket number to which event has to be merged

properties.name: event_last_detected
properties.description: Time when this event last occurred

properties.name: severity
properties.description:
Critical
Major
Minor
Warning 
Error
Info
clear

(Info and warning will be ignored and ticket will be not created)

properties.name: event_metric_name
properties.description:
Name of the metric that triggered the alert. Example CPU or Memory utilization reached threshold

Maximum: 256 Characters

properties.name: event_time
properties.description: Time when this event is created in Source system

properties.name: alertPermalink
properties.description: clicable link to alert details

properties.name: account
properties.description: The Account ID for the Service Now customer

properties.name: event_type
properties.description: Stateful or Stateless (Default value is stateless). If “Null” set default as Stateless

properties.name: event_origin_id
properties.description:
Event id from the origin system

Maximum: 50 Characters

properties.name: ci_node_identifier_type
properties.description:
Possible Values are , If “Null” assume default as CI name

CI Name
FQDN
IP Address
Mac Address
Serial Number
SN CI SysID
IP Address
Must use this for \ns

event_message = event_message.replace("\"", "\\\"")

event_message_short = event_message_short.replace("\"", "\\\"")
